name: Radical Arcade
description:
An ongoing collection of arcade-y games.

This is the first release in a long series of games I'll be making to strengthen and test my gamedev/Unity skills.

Project 1, Radical Arcade, is a collection of short games made one at a time in small bursts. The final burst in this project will be a large series of changes to tie together all of the minigames and give them a greater meaning.

  • Currently finished games:
    • Boulers - A snake-y game about boule-ing anteaters.

Attributions:

bread_0 - mau mar
bread_1 - Monika Grabkowska
bread_3 - Vicky Ng
bread_5 - Mike Kenneally
bread_7 - Sergio Arze
Input Buttons - Kenney
Desert Theme - Ted Kerr
